import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { CoinsPriceContext, CoinsPriceProvider } from './AuthContext.js'; import './App.css' import btc from './images/btc.png' import eth from './images/eth.png' import bnb from './images/bnb.png' import ada from './images/ada.png' import xrp from './images/xrp.png' const images = [ btc, eth, bnb, ada, xrp, ]; function App() { const [currentImage, setCurrentImage] = useState(0); const CoinsPriceProvider = useContext(CoinsPriceContext); useEffect(() => { setInterval(() => { setCurrentImage((currentImage + 1) % images.length); }, 10000); }, [currentImage]); return (
